name: dust collector production, multicyclone | dust collector, multicyclone | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1362/documentation

This dataset represent the production and the disposal of a multicyclone for industrial use, dimensioned to be connected to a wood furnace with capacity of about 1000kW. The air flow capacity is 2222 liters per second. Could be used as a dust collector for other industrial processes with a comparable capacity. It could be scaled for other different capacity.

From reception of furnace components at the factory gate

This activity ends with the disposal of the device in the end of its lifetime. The dataset includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the multicyclone (mainly steel and steel alloys). The dataset includes energy required for the construction and the disposal of the device. The dataset doesnt  include the basement in concrete for the installation.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2819:Manufacture of other general-purpose machinery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Could be used for central European conditions.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Typical multicyclone for for dust collection from wood boilers. This device is dimensioned to be applied in conjunction with a wood furnace 1000kW thermal capacity.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: literature, furnace manual available for customers, investigation and personal communication from producer and technician
